name: Backstage (Rainbow_Cookies)
description:
Zachary Cook: a worldwide star of the stage, ready to embark on his newest music tour... suddenly pulls the plug on the rest of the show. All of his shows, until further notice.
Having just seen a different concert at the same venue that hosted Zachary's final performance, three college students sneak in seeking answers. But will their curiosity take them too far?

MAJOR thanks to my talented friends:

Gepeto for the AWESOME character sprite art! (Instagram @gepeto.art)

Liam Northcott for the jazzy soundtrack and item jingles (More of his work can be found here: https://soundcloud.com/igladurfun)

@holy.cherrytea for her beautiful item art
